coroutines.cocreate.description: Create a coroutine that executes the function

coroutines.coresume.description: Resume a created coroutine, passing optional additional parameters in first time.

coroutines.costatus.description: Get the status of a coroutine, either 'running', 'suspended', or 'dead'.

coroutines.yield.description: Pause execution from within a coroutine.
